net.stemkoski.bagel

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.stemkoski.bagel.Texture

  • public class Texture
extends java.lang.Object
    Image data used when drawing a Sprite or a Tile. Texture objects are typically created using the load(String) method. Multiple instances of a Sprite may share a single Texture reference.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      javafx.scene.image.Image image
      The image to be drawn.
      Rectangle region
      A rectangular sub-area of the image to be drawn.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Texture()
      Create an empty texture.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Texture load(java.lang.String imageFileName)
      Create a Texture from the image file with the given file name.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • image

        public javafx.scene.image.Image image
        The image to be drawn.

      • region

        public Rectangle region
        A rectangular sub-area of the image to be drawn.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Texture

        Texture()
        Create an empty texture. Useful when reusing a previously loaded image; used by Animation and TileMap.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static Texture load(java.lang.String imageFileName)
        Create a Texture from the image file with the given file name. Sets region to the original image dimensions.
        Parameters:
        imageFileName - name of the image file
        Returns:
        A Texture object that displays the image file with the given file name.
